Description: Ostracon, large section (two fragments joined) of the body of a drab-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is reddish in section and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of three lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393978) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393978)
